description_text_override.last_approved_text: Those with knowledge may summon great gusts of wind or fearsome arcs of lightning to harass their enemies.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Those with knowledge may summon great gusts of wind or fearsome arcs of lightning to harass their enemies.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: To control animals and twist their natural aggression to your own ends shows true mastery of your art.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: To control animals and twist their natural aggression to your own ends shows true mastery of your art.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Proponents of the Lore of Life protect and heal friendly troops and allies, whilst forestalling their foes at every turn.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Proponents of the Lore of Life protect and heal friendly troops and allies, whilst forestalling their foes at every turn.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: The bravest of warriors, Paladins charge into battle either mounted or on foot, bringing righteous death in the Lady's name.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: The bravest of warriors, Paladins charge into battle either mounted or on foot, bringing righteous death in the Lady's name.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: A Chaos Sorcerer deals in death no matter which lore he wields, yet those who manipulate the Wind of Shyish take particular joy in ending the lives of mortals. It is their cruel laughter which is heard as the Purple Sun is summoned!

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: A Chaos Sorcerer deals in death no matter which lore he wields, yet those who manipulate the Wind of Shyish take particular joy in ending the lives of mortals. It is their cruel laughter which is heard as the Purple Sun is summoned!

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Some creatures just want to see the world burn. The Sorcerers of Chaos certainly fall into that category, bending the flaming Wind of Aqshy to their ill wills, spreading fire and pain in the name of the Dark Gods.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Some creatures just want to see the world burn. The Sorcerers of Chaos certainly fall into that category, bending the flaming Wind of Aqshy to their ill wills, spreading fire and pain in the name of the Dark Gods.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Chaos Sorcerers who rip Chamon from the ever-flowing Winds of Magic use its flowing, glutinous form to shape metal into tools of dread, imprison souls in imperfect statues of gold, and to melt the armour from any who challenge their Ruinous Masters.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Chaos Sorcerers who rip Chamon from the ever-flowing Winds of Magic use its flowing, glutinous form to shape metal into tools of dread, imprison souls in imperfect statues of gold, and to melt the armour from any who challenge their Ruinous Masters.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Cloaked in the power of the beast, the Bray-Shaman uses his primal mutations to exert greater strength.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Cloaked in the power of the beast, the Bray-Shaman uses his primal mutations to exert greater strength.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Death whispers to the Bray-Shaman, who speaks the words to his enemies with hideous, incorporeal power.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Death whispers to the Bray-Shaman, who speaks the words to his enemies with hideous, incorporeal power.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: The earth speaks and the Bray-Shaman hears it. Nature flows through him, giving him mastery over the land itself.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: The earth speaks and the Bray-Shaman hears it. Nature flows through him, giving him mastery over the land itself.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Devotees of the Lore of Beasts, Amber Wizards are renowned for their savage appearance; their hair is wild and unkempt and they dress in furs adorned with bones, feathers, amber beads and primitive talismans.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Devotees of the Lore of Beasts, Amber Wizards are renowned for their savage appearance; their hair is wild and unkempt and they dress in furs adorned with bones, feathers, amber beads and primitive talismans.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Grey Wizards study spells of concealment and illusion, which do not lend themselves well to the favour of ordinary folk. They are sometimes called Trickster Wizards, though never to their faces.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Grey Wizards study spells of concealment and illusion, which do not lend themselves well to the favour of ordinary folk. They are sometimes called Trickster Wizards, though never to their faces.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: A Jade Wizard's power is linked to the seasons, being vigorous in spring, powerful in the summer, waning over the autumn and weakest in winter. They tend to roam the dark forests where Life Magic flows more freely.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: A Jade Wizard's power is linked to the seasons, being vigorous in spring, powerful in the summer, waning over the autumn and weakest in winter. They tend to roam the dark forests where Life Magic flows more freely.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: The Spellsingers of Athel Loren shield themselves by joining their minds to the forest's sleeping consciousness.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: The Spellsingers of Athel Loren shield themselves by joining their minds to the forest's sleeping consciousness.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: The Spellsingers of Athel Loren shield themselves by joining their minds to the forest's sleeping consciousness.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: The Spellsingers of Athel Loren shield themselves by joining their minds to the forest's sleeping consciousness.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: The Spellsingers of Athel Loren shield themselves by joining their minds to the forest's sleeping consciousness.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: The Spellsingers of Athel Loren shield themselves by joining their minds to the forest's sleeping consciousness.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: The holder of secrets and keeper of the way, whose strength is the quester's ultimate test.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: The holder of secrets and keeper of the way, whose strength is the quester's ultimate test.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: As master Phantasmancers, Chaos Sorcerers use the Lore of Shadows to confound, weaving an aura of darkness and dread about their victims.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: As master Phantasmancers, Chaos Sorcerers use the Lore of Shadows to confound, weaving an aura of darkness and dread about their victims.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Bright Wizards are easily recognised for their red robes and wild orange hair and beards. They are of a fiery temperament, their anger changing from a guttering flame to a raging inferno in a split second.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Bright Wizards are easily recognised for their red robes and wild orange hair and beards. They are of a fiery temperament, their anger changing from a guttering flame to a raging inferno in a split second.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Celestial Wizards spend most of their time gazing into the night skies, plotting the movements of the astral bodies. Their spells are able to call lightning from the skies and summon meteorites to smite the enemy.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Celestial Wizards spend most of their time gazing into the night skies, plotting the movements of the astral bodies. Their spells are able to call lightning from the skies and summon meteorites to smite the enemy.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Light Wizards are rarely seen without treasured tomes and arcane scrolls in hand. Light Magic is renowned for its powers of protection, yet a Light Wizard can also capture blazing lights to blind and burn a foe.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Light Wizards are rarely seen without treasured tomes and arcane scrolls in hand. Light Magic is renowned for its powers of protection, yet a Light Wizard can also capture blazing lights to blind and burn a foe.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Night Goblin Shamans wear the easily recognised hoods of their kind and are known for being particularly crazed due to eating vast quantities of hallucinogenic mushrooms.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Night Goblin Shamans wear the easily recognised hoods of their kind and are known for being particularly crazed due to eating vast quantities of hallucinogenic mushrooms.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Orc Shamans have been known to cause a foe's brains to burst out of his skull, shoot death beams out of their own beady eyes or summon an almighty green foot from the skies to stomp anything unfortunate enough to be underneath.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Orc Shamans have been known to cause a foe's brains to burst out of his skull, shoot death beams out of their own beady eyes or summon an almighty green foot from the skies to stomp anything unfortunate enough to be underneath.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: It is no surprise that some Liche Priests excel at manipulating the Wind of Shyish, and are unsurpassed at Death Magic.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: It is no surprise that some Liche Priests excel at manipulating the Wind of Shyish, and are unsurpassed at Death Magic.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Where there is dark there must be light. And so, just as day follows night, there are those in the Mortuary Cult who are skilled at banishment magic, and white wizardry.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Where there is dark there must be light. And so, just as day follows night, there are those in the Mortuary Cult who are skilled at banishment magic, and white wizardry.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: The Lore of Nehekhara was created by the Liche Priests of the Mortuary Cult in their quest to unlock the secrets of immortality.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: The Lore of Nehekhara was created by the Liche Priests of the Mortuary Cult in their quest to unlock the secrets of immortality.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: In the shadows of the great pyramids do the Liche Priests practice their dark arts. While some excel in Death Magic, or even Light, others have tamed Phantasmancy.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: In the shadows of the great pyramids do the Liche Priests practice their dark arts. While some excel in Death Magic, or even Light, others have tamed Phantasmancy.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: This Necrotect's one aim is to spend his Unlife colonising a ruined settlement, a power given to him through the Rite of the Great Incantation of Ptra.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: This Necrotect's one aim is to spend his Unlife colonising a ruined settlement, a power given to him through the Rite of the Great Incantation of Ptra.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Spells cast with 'Dhar', or Dark Magic, are the most destructive. They are powered by the unrefined Winds of Magic, so the cost to both the spellcaster and their victims is great indeed.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Spells cast with 'Dhar', or Dark Magic, are the most destructive. They are powered by the unrefined Winds of Magic, so the cost to both the spellcaster and their victims is great indeed.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: While most Druchii Sorcerers use the dark in their magic, the fire from pyromancy is bright. However, those in Naggaroth that wield 'Aqshy' do not think of it as glowing flame, instead looking to the black, choking smoke that always accompanies fire.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: While most Druchii Sorcerers use the dark in their magic, the fire from pyromancy is bright. However, those in Naggaroth that wield 'Aqshy' do not think of it as glowing flame, instead looking to the black, choking smoke that always accompanies fire.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Most Sorceresses of Ghrond lurk in the utter darkness, but there are those that walk close to the light still, using illusions to spin cruel visions and trick predators and prey to get the souls they desire.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Most Sorceresses of Ghrond lurk in the utter darkness, but there are those that walk close to the light still, using illusions to spin cruel visions and trick predators and prey to get the souls they desire.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Unlike men, the powerful Mages of Ulthuan can manipulate the full spectrum of the magical Winds and use a pure, combined form known as 'Qhaysh' or High Magic.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Unlike men, the powerful Mages of Ulthuan can manipulate the full spectrum of the magical Winds and use a pure, combined form known as 'Qhaysh' or High Magic.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: The realms of Ulthuan are filled with magical eddies that entwine and weave through the forests and heaths. Thus, there are Mages that master the Wind of 'Ghyran' like it was second nature.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: The realms of Ulthuan are filled with magical eddies that entwine and weave through the forests and heaths. Thus, there are Mages that master the Wind of 'Ghyran' like it was second nature.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: While Elven Mages have the ability to use the combined might of High Magic, a few choose to specialise in certain areas if they have a gift or talent. Those that channel 'Hysh' excel at confronting and banishing Daemons.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: While Elven Mages have the ability to use the combined might of High Magic, a few choose to specialise in certain areas if they have a gift or talent. Those that channel 'Hysh' excel at confronting and banishing Daemons.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Some Skink Priests are adept at communicating not just with other reptiles, but with all creatures of the jungle. They are skilled in manipulating the Wind of 'Ghur'.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Some Skink Priests are adept at communicating not just with other reptiles, but with all creatures of the jungle. They are skilled in manipulating the Wind of 'Ghur'.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: Skink Astromancers are relatively rare, their spawning marked with a meteor shower over Tlaxtlan. They serve the most powerful of their kind, known as 'the Beholder', who sends them far and wide in service of the Great Plan.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: Skink Astromancers are relatively rare, their spawning marked with a meteor shower over Tlaxtlan. They serve the most powerful of their kind, known as 'the Beholder', who sends them far and wide in service of the Great Plan.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: This Plague Priest's one aim is to expend his life spreading deadly plagues to cripple the enemy; a power given to him through the Rite of the Pestilent Scheme.

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: This Plague Priest's one aim is to expend his life spreading deadly plagues to cripple the enemy; a power given to him through the Rite of the Pestilent Scheme.

description_text_override.last_approved_text: This Warlock Engineer's one aim is to expend his life in an insane Warpstone-fuelled detonation, designed to cripple enemy settlements; a power given to him through the Rite of the Scheme of DOOOOM!

agent_subtypes.description_text_override: This Warlock Engineer's one aim is to expend his life in an insane Warpstone-fuelled detonation, designed to cripple enemy settlements; a power given to him through the Rite of the Scheme of DOOOOM!
